entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
